SELECT pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.user_id AS userId, pi.images, pi.create_date AS createDate, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM post_info pi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = pi.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.userName},'%')
AND pi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.title},'%')
AND pi.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.content},'%')
AND pi.user_id = #{postInfo.userId}
ORDER BY pi.create_date

SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.create_date AS createDate, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = ri.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ri.post_id = #{ postId } ORDER BY ui.create_date DESC

SELECT pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.create_date AS createDate, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar, COUNT(ri.post_id) replyNum FROM post_info pi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( pi.user_id = ui.id ) LEFT JOIN reply_info ri ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY pi.id
SELECT pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.create_date AS createDate, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM post_info pi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( pi.user_id = ui.id ) WHERE pi.id = #{postId}

SELECT pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.create_date AS createDate, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM post_info pi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( pi.user_id = ui.id ) WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY pi.create_date DESC LIMIT 4
